header.subtitle_1: It’s hard to build and maintain UI components. Don’t start from scratch every time you create a new project. Build them once, run them everywhere!
header.subtitle_2: Use our open source UI component library

first.title: versatile
first.text: Runs on every major framework: Angular, React, Vue or just plain JavaScript.

second.title: consistent
second.text: Consistent UI across all framework technologies.

third.title: futureproof
third.text: Continuous development with the latest technology and creative minds.

component_sample.subheader: Check out some of our components

contact.description: Do you have any questions, suggestions or want to work with us? Then we look forward to your message!
